reviews.sentence: Last day of Free Parking. The food at Rise was mediocre the slot machines were very tightheard lots of complaints the minimum at the tables was very high for the average visitor and it was the END of Free Garage Parking now 10. Starting Aug 1 2016 they are charging 10 dollars to park in the garages. They have limited outdoor ground parking but it fills fast. Their table games Black jack Three Card Poker Let It ride and others are usually set at minimum of 15 and goes up from there. They have electronic roulette and craps with 10 or 25 dollar minimums. I have been going there for years but plan to stop now.

10 dollars to park. What a joke. I have been going to the Seminole casino since it was a bingo hall and had the lotto machines. Was so excited when they got the table games. I have been playing blackjack for 30 plus years and if you would have told me there would be a full casino in Tampa and I was not there at least once a week I would have called you crazy. Hard Rock has ruined that. Overpriced table games some rude staff and now asking for paid parking. Not for me. Shame. Had some fun times despite the fact any of my group would leave ahead of the game. Hard Rock needs competition.

Went paid for parking and got followed by someone. OK. I went to the casino paid for the parking and then got followed into the elevator by someone. Come on Hard rock we took your word about the security increase then get followed from the casino floor elevators at 1 pm in the afternoon. I motioned to my wife not to get off let this man off. Went up to the 4th floor went back down he was waiting. THIS IS NOT ACCEPTABLE AND NO EXCUSE. Pressure wash the parking floors they smell like urine. Come on guys. I do nt want a response back. We the people wants action. And the bulbs in Thomas Edison s house in Fort Myers 16 watt are brighter then what you installed. The only people we saw were two people cleaning all the way at the far end from the elevators and the two people making sure you pay. IM FED UP.

we used to go on a weekly basis now not no more. 10 to park. that is crazy. my husband has been going there for over 30 yrs as much as the made off of people like us over the yrs and they want to charge to park a car. they lost our busines.

Since you all charge to park it has been sucky never win anymore. We go often but donate our money on slots. Luckily i have a elite card but after that runs out i will not go back and pay for parking to lose my money. I guess your guest have to pay for the new garages they are building lighten up let your guest win.

Probably my favorite place to be. Usually the staff is amazing and it is typically clean. In this instance we have seen some things that were not typical but we got by. It seems the construction is using more resources than expected. Or possibly just a change on staff. There have been a lot of changes going on with moving machines parking things they used to always carry in the shop are no longer available in some cases. I absolutely can not wait to see this after construction is completely done. The diorama looks incredible. This is where we go to get away from it all and a personal favorite of mine.
Great fun. My only negative comments is they now charge for parking.
have not been there in a few months and was surprised that the parking garage had a 10 fee. did not like that aspect but overall I enjoy the casino.
Very disappointed that they now charge 10 dollars for parking. It will be a long time before I am back. Who charged to park st a casino.

The casino is clean and very nice after renovations and I like the extra entrances b UT parking is still a nightmare. And the staff are kind of short and annoyed by any little thing you ask. Or at least that is how they come off.
Easy to get to Lots of parking for an oversized pickup and win win WINNING.
Fun way to spend an afternoon or evening. Free garage parking. Plenty of entertainment and cuisine to chose from.

Awesome place to gamble but it is under remodel which has parking messed up. I am sure it will be better after the construction is done. We win and we lose. I hate losing but you can not win if you do not play. have not stayed in the hotel because it is too expensive.
Always clean and safe. Cafe is very good parking is excellent.

Always have fun here wish the slots were loser but there is no local competition. Casino has plenty of security and is clean with lots of parking. Looking forward to the renovations and additions being completed soon.

They have done a great job with the updates. New parking garage on Orient is nice clean and convenient. We got 15 in match play but lost it on the Christmas Story machine. Oh Randy. Band was good that night at the cafe. You still have to get through the smoke no matter where you go here. They have non smoking areas which is great. However you will still encounter smoke. it is inevitable.
Pretty sure my clothes still reek of tar. Felt like they had turned the A C off as we were met my a wall of stale cigarette smoke as we entered. Place looks great though good parking aswel.
Smoke free Casino option which is a huge plus if you hate smelling like smoke after gambling. Garage parking is nice and free. Great buffet.

Had to pay for the air you breathe it felt like everything else was so expensive heres an add on to my review. Was there Wednesday park my truck in valet. Today Saturday went to do laundry found out all my quarters from my console was swiped almost 25 worth thanks again Hard Rock.
